attributes.action: arrest & try Tony Blair for war crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the illegality of Blair's invasion of Iraq, his lies to Parliament, he should be arrested and surrendered to the Hague War Crimes Tribunal to answer for his crimes. He is also to be made to face the families of those for whose deaths he is personally responsible - as a direct result of his illegal war in Iraq

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
